EmailTemplate.name: 03_17_2014 MSFT-VMM Webinar Reminder.Email_Img
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Register for the Hyper-V Readiness Series | {{lead.First Name:default=&}} Win a LEGO Star Destroyer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Free Webinar: The Hyper-V Readiness Series Presented by Virtualization Software & VMTurbo March 19th, 2014 | 11am-12pm EST
REGISTER NOW: <http://bit.ly/1fRRw8i>
Join virtualization experts Scott Lowe & David Davis of Virtualization Software as they discuss the imperative of diversity in tomorrow's virtual datacenter, and Microsoft's ready-for-prime time Hyper-V ecosystem. In celebration of the hypervisor wars, all registrants are entered to win a LEGO Imperial Star Destroyer!
REGISTER NOW: <http://bit.ly/1fRRw8i>
